TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p ə l iː s k ɔːɹ s t ɛ l ɚ æ s k ɚ h ɚ t ʊ b ɹ iː n d iː s t ɪ n z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ɛ s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ b iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v ɚ b ɹ uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w ɪ ɔː l s oʊ n iː ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n ɡ ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔːɹ f ɹ ɑː k f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ z ʃ iː k æ n s k oʊ p ð iː z t ɪ n z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ b æ k s æ n w ɪ w ᵻ ɡ oʊ m iː h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ɛ tʃ ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
